description:
Bring a little or a lot of light with you, wherever you go. On-grid or off, the Ultra 3.0 L area light is sure to come in handy, from lighting your backcountry cabin, to keeping the monsters away during a power outage. With infinite dimming and 3 different colour temperatures, this area light has a mode for anywhere you find darkness. The large internal battery also doubles as a power bank, so you can charge and top-up your USB powered devices.

  • 3 different white light temperatures: cool (6500K), natural (4200K), or warm (3000K)
  • 17,400mAh battery can also be used to charge other USB powered devices, via the type-A USB port
  • Smooth dimming, just press and hold the button to dial in your perfect brightness; range: warm light 50-1350 lumens, cool light 100-2700
  • SOS mode is there if things take a turn for the worse
  • LED battery indicator lets you know how your battery is doing in use and while charging
  • External frame plays multiple roles, acting as a handle, lash points, and roll cage
  • IP65 waterproofing isn’t bothered by heavy rain
  • Easy USB-C charging, 0-100% in 7h
  • ¼” thread tripod mounts let you mount your light on tripods or other camera mounts
  • Dimensions: 20 x 9 x 3.4cm
  • In the box: Ultra 3.0 L Area Light, lantern hook, storage case, USB-C charging cable, and manual
  • During storage fully charge the Ultra 3.0 L Area Light every 3-6 months and store in a cool, dry place
name: Claymore Ultra 3.0 Area Light
